intelligent.title: Smart Generation Logic
intelligent.desc: While melodies are randomly generated by algorithms, they're not entirely chaotic; they maintain balanced melodic lines and musicality, ensuring practice pieces are both challenging and listenable.

professional.title: Professional Sheet Music Rendering
professional.desc: Powered by OpenSheetMusicDisplay engine, providing publication-quality clear sheet music display for a professional reading experience during practice.

customize.title: Fully Customizable
customize.desc: Supports multi-dimensional personalized settings including key signatures, ranges, rhythm types, interval spans, accidentals, and more to create your exclusive practice regimen.

keys.title: 24 Major & Minor Keys
keys.desc: Covers all common keys, including natural minor, harmonic minor, and melodic minor variations.

rhythm.title: Rich Rhythm Options
rhythm.desc: From whole notes to sixteenth notes, including dotted notes, triplets and complex rhythms to meet the needs of all learning stages.

guitar.title: Guitar Techniques
guitar.desc: Fully covers accents, staccato, grace notes, hammer-ons, pull-offs, making your sight reading practice closer to actual performance.

metronome.title: Built-in Metronome
metronome.desc: No additional tools needed, maintain steady rhythm during practice, with support for all time signatures (4/4, 3/4, 6/8, etc.).

audio.title: Audio Playback
audio.desc: Play randomly generated melodies for ear training or comparison with correct performance.

multiplatform.title: Multi-Platform Support
multiplatform.desc: Perfect adaptation for mobile, tablet, and desktop, allowing you to practice sight reading anytime, anywhere!
